title: Offseason Moves Teams Should Make: Raiders trade for Cam Newton, Vikings blow it up, Chargers pursue Tom Brady (Football 3/5)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Jason La Canfora to discuss various moves that teams should make this offseason. The guys discuss the Raiders trading for a former MVP (5:45), the Chargers going after the GOAT (13:00). JLC proceeds to fill us in on the latest with Tom Brady (18:10). Next, Will and Jason go over Patriots contingency plans (23:30), and why a playoff team from last year should consider dealing their top offensive weapons (27:45). What's the plan in Jacksonville (38:30)? How likely is it that the Colts sign Philip Rivers (42:45)? How should the Cowboys and Eagles address their offseason needs (46:55)? All those questions are addressed and more in this makeover edition of the Pick Six podcast.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @JasonLaCanfora
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
